trans-unit.source: The natural VPN
trans-unit.target: The natural VPN

trans-unit.source: Harnessing the power of community creates a natural and truly next-generation VPN experience. Choose from a network of VPN providers with flexible, pay-as-you-go pricing so it’s easy to find service that works for you. Access the open internet from restricted zones, harden your security with multiple hops and choose where you want your traffic to exit. All open-source, secure and without any middlemen.
trans-unit.target: Harnessing the power of community creates a natural and truly next-generation VPN experience. Choose from a network of VPN providers with flexible, pay-as-you-go pricing so it’s easy to find service that works for you. Access the open internet from restricted zones, harden your security with multiple hops and choose where you want your traffic to exit. All open-source, secure and without any middlemen.

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop security
trans-unit.target: Multi-hop security

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop routing connects multiple relays and adds security at each step.
trans-unit.target: Multi-hop routing connects multiple relays and adds security at each step.

trans-unit.source: Connect out
trans-unit.target: Connect out

trans-unit.source: Connect out of restricted zones. Works with existing VPN providers that are blocked.
trans-unit.target: Connect out of restricted zones. Works with existing VPN providers that are blocked.

trans-unit.source: Low cost
trans-unit.target: Low cost

trans-unit.source: No middleman or monthly contracts. Pay peer-to-peer, just for what you use.
trans-unit.target: No middleman or monthly contracts. Pay peer-to-peer, just for what you use.

trans-unit.source: About us
trans-unit.target: About us

trans-unit.source: Can decentralized technologies preserve democracy? (Oslo Freedom Forum)
trans-unit.target: Can decentralized technologies preserve democracy? (Oslo Freedom Forum)

trans-unit.source: Dr. Seven Waterhouse, Orchid co-founder & CEO discusses solutions to combat the global rise of centralized surveillance states and how decentralization of the global internet architecture could be the key to preserving democracy, privacy, and individual rights.
trans-unit.target: Dr. Seven Waterhouse, Orchid co-founder & CEO discusses solutions to combat the global rise of centralized surveillance states and how decentralization of the global internet architecture could be the key to preserving democracy, privacy, and individual rights.

trans-unit.source: Why We Need a Better VPN
trans-unit.target: Why We Need a Better VPN

trans-unit.source: As dueling interests move to control the future of the internet, users around the globe are increasingly turning to VPNs. But what users don't know is that many VPNs fail to provide the security and privacy that they advertise.
trans-unit.target: As dueling interests move to control the future of the internet, users around the globe are increasingly turning to VPNs. But what users don't know is that many VPNs fail to provide the security and privacy that they advertise.

trans-unit.source: Access Denied: Restoring the Internet's Openness
trans-unit.target: Access Denied: Restoring the Internet's Openness

trans-unit.source: Governments and corporate interests are competing to own the future of the internet, and with it, control information and personal data. As users, developers, and investors, how can we take back control?
trans-unit.target: Governments and corporate interests are competing to own the future of the internet, and with it, control information and personal data. As users, developers, and investors, how can we take back control?

trans-unit.source: The Commodification of You
trans-unit.target: The Commodification of You

trans-unit.source: How ISPs, apps, third parties, and websites are raking in the big bucks by tracking your clicks, emails, and purchases—and what we can do to control our digital identities.
trans-unit.target: How ISPs, apps, third parties, and websites are raking in the big bucks by tracking your clicks, emails, and purchases—and what we can do to control our digital identities.

trans-unit.source: Founders
trans-unit.target: Founders

trans-unit.source: Orchid’s founders bring together deep experience in the open source software community (BASH Shell, GNU Finger), technology management (RPX IPO), blockchain investment (Bitstamp, Pantera Capital), jailbroken app package management (Cydia) and security (Wells Fargo’s 1st Online Banking, Ethereum core security team).
trans-unit.target: Orchid’s founders bring together deep experience in the open source software community (BASH Shell, GNU Finger), technology management (RPX IPO), blockchain investment (Bitstamp, Pantera Capital), jailbroken app package management (Cydia) and security (Wells Fargo’s 1st Online Banking, Ethereum core security team).

trans-unit.source: Backed by leading investors
trans-unit.target: Backed by leading investors
